snippet: Ahead of Sunday's Rangers-Bruins game at Madison Square Garden, in which the Rangers can clinch the No. 1 seed in the Eastern Conference and home ice through at least the first three rounds of the playoffs, Coach John Tortorella was in extreme...
abstract: Ahead of Sunday's Rangers-Bruins game at Madison Square Garden, in which the Rangers can clinch the No. 1 seed in the Eastern Conference and home ice through at least the first three rounds of the playoffs, Coach John Tortorella was in extreme business-only mode.

headline.main: Anticipation High for Rangers-Bruins, but Tortorella Doesn't Let On
